Deadline  online  registration: 2.5.2022
. After this date, only on-site registration will be possible. A supplement of CHF 100.- will be charged for on-site registration.

CANCELLATION
All registrations received are considered binding. In the event of cancellation by 2.5.2022 CHF 100.- will be charged. After this date the full amount will be due.

PRIVACY
By registering you agree that your personal data may be stored and that photos of the symposium may be used for marketing purposes.
All the revenues of the Symposium will be used for research and education.
